TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyPath extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一个数据结构，用于将某个属性描述为另一个属性或所属类型下的路径。

span.span: Implements a data structure for describing a property as a path below another property, or below an owning type.

summary.span: 属性路径用在对象的数据绑定中，并用在动画的演示图板和时间线中。

span.span: Property paths are used in data binding to objects, and in storyboards and timelines for animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含一个字符串和一个包含在字符串 中的依赖项属性的列表。This class contains a string , and list of dependency properties that are the into the string . 支持两种行为模式: supports two modes of behavior: **Source 模式**描述了属性的路径, 该属性用作其他操作的源。**Source mode** describes a path to a property that is used as a source for some other operation. 该类使用此模式来支持数据绑定。This mode is used by the class to support data binding. **目标模式**描述将被设置为目标属性的属性的路径。**Target mode** describes a path to a property that will be set as a target property. 此模式由动画用于支持情节提要和时间线资源库。This mode is used by animation in support of storyboard and timeline setters. 例如, `Background.Opacity`是一个两步路径。For instance, `Background.Opacity` is a two-step path. 此路径隐含: 首先, 查找`Background`对象的属性, 获取`Background`属性设置为的值对象, 然后`Opacity`获取该对象的属性值。This path implies: first, find the `Background` property of an object, get the value object that the `Background` property is set to, and then get the value of the `Opacity` property on that object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *propertyPath**propertyPath* 计算为简单或复杂属性路径的字符串。A string that is evaluated to be either a simple or complex property path. 用于设置中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的语法是通用的, 但却是复杂的, 并且在单独的主题[PropertyPath XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)中进行了介绍。The syntax for setting a in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is versatile but complex, and is described in the separate topic [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object parameter) cil managed

param.name: parameter
param.span: 一个属性路径，它描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 属性或单一依赖项属性的路径。

span.span: A property path that either describes a path to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property, or a single dependency property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数具有两个完全不同的用法, 具体取决于它是用于绑定的源模式属性路径, 还是用于情节提要目标的目标模式单步骤属性路径。This constructor has two completely different usages depending on whether it is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, or for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target. 如果在源模式下将此用于绑定, `parameter`则是表示属性名称的字符串, 也可以是一个字符串, 该字符串描述[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]要用作源的对象的对象模型中的属性的 "单步执行" 路径。用于绑定。If using this in source mode for a binding, `parameter` is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 对于绑定属性路径, 标识 "步骤" 的字符是一个点 (.)。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 还支持索引器引用 (包括多个索引器和类型区分)。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 有关对象特别使用的字符串语法的更多详细信息, 请参阅。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 用作绑定源的属性不需要是依赖属性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果绑定双向更新, 则引用的属性必须是读写属性。If the binding updates two-way, the property referenced must be read-write. 另请注意, 绑定目标必须是依赖项属性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果在目标模式下将此用于情节提要目标的单步路径, `parameter`通常以类型形式提供。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, `parameter` is generally provided as type . 您还可以指定一个字符串。You can also specify a string that is the . 这两个值的计算结果都是相同的, 因为它在内部存储为字符串。Either of these evaluate to the same result, because it is stored internally as a string. 通过将提供的转换为字符串。A provided is converted to a string through . 支持依赖项属性的限定命名格式, 因此可以指定*typeName。* 代码中构造函数的属性名称限定依赖属性名称字符串。The supports a qualified naming format for dependency properties, so you can specify a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string to the constructor in code. 依赖属性标识符的限定路径与复杂路径的概念不同。The qualified path to the dependency property identifier is a different concept than a complex path. 应改为使用构造函数创建复杂路径。A complex-path should instead be created with the constructor.

summary.span: 使用提供的路径标记字符串和参数初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided pathing token string and parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此签名通常仅用于具有复杂路径的目标模式用法。This signature is generally only used for target-mode usages with complex paths. 此构造函数`params`支持`pathParameters`构造函数参数。This constructor supports `params` for the `pathParameters` constructor argument. 因此, 你可以将的内容`pathParameters`指定为一系列用逗号分隔的构造函数参数, 这些参数可填充数组, 而不需要对数组进行维度`pathParameters`处理, 然后使用项填充它。Therefore you can specify the contents of `pathParameters` as a series of comma-separated constructor arguments that populate the array, rather than needing to dimension an array and then populate it with the `pathParameters` items. 你指定的每个项必须是以下类型之一: 、 、 。Each item you specify must be one of the following types: , , . 有关参数要求的详细信息, 请参阅和。 For more information on the requirements of the parameters, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置描述路径的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that describes the path.
The string that describes the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性中包含的字符串具有三个完全不同的含义, 具体取决于是否用于绑定的源模式属性路径、演示图板目标的目标模式单步骤属性路径, 或用于复杂的情节提要目标的路径。The string contained in this property has three completely different meanings depending on whether a is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target, or for a complex path for a storyboard target. 如果在源模式下将此用于绑定, 则是表示属性名称的字符串, 也可以是一个字符串, 该字符串描述[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]要用作源的对象的对象模型中的属性的 "单步执行" 路径。用于绑定。If using this in source mode for a binding, is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 对于绑定属性路径, 标识 "步骤" 的字符是一个点 (.)。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 还支持索引器引用 (包括多个索引器和类型区分)。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 有关对象特别使用的字符串语法的更多详细信息, 请参阅。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 用作绑定源的属性不需要是依赖属性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果绑定双向更新, 则属性源必须是读写的。If the binding updates two-way, the property source must be read-write. 另请注意, 绑定目标必须是依赖项属性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果在目标模式下将此用于情节提要目标的单步路径, 则是作为*类型名称*的字符串。*propertyName*限定的依赖项属性名称字符串。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, is a string that is a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string. 如果将此用于情节提要目标的复杂路径, 则是一种标记化字符串格式, 用于描述中给定的各种对象的关系。If using this for a complex path for a storyboard target, is a tokenized string format that describes the relationships of the various objects given in the . - 使用括在括号中的项的数组索引按此格式指定数组中的每一项。Each item in the array is specified in this format by the array index for the item enclosed in parentheses. 例如, 若要指定数组中的第一项, 则字符串标记为`(0)`。For example, to specify the first item in the array, the string token is `(0)`. - 项之间的关系 (路径中的 "步骤") 由点 (.) 指定。Relationships between items ("steps" in the path) are specified by a dot (.). 点的属性向前是路径中的第一步, 后面的属性是第二步 (可以指定除2外的步骤)。The property forward of the dot is the first step in the path, the property after is the second step, and so on (you can specify steps beyond two). 链中的最后一步始终表示正在进行动画处理的属性。The last step in the chain always represents the property being animated. - 使用索引器语法访问集合属性内的项, 索引括在方括号 ([和]) 中。Items within collection properties are accessed with an indexer syntax, with the index within square brackets ([ and ]). 索引器将附加到表示属性的标记。The indexer is additive to the token representing the property. 例如, 下面是一个两步路径, 其标记组合在第一步中, 它指定了该属性的集合中的第二个项: `(0)[1].(1)` 。For example, the following is a two-step path, with the token combination in the first step specifying the second item from within the collection of that property: `(0)[1].(1)` . 不能对链中的最后一个属性使用索引器;不能对实际的集合位置进行动画处理, 必须对该对象上的属性进行动画处理。You cannot use an indexer on the last property in the chain; you cannot animate the actual collection position, you must animate a property on that object. 通常通过构造函数建立的路径字符串 : 用于绑定的签名或单步演示图板目标的签名 (多步骤情节提要目标的签名)。The path string for a is typically established through the constructors: the signature for bindings or single-step storyboard targets, the signature for multi-step storyboard targets. **XAML**当使用在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]描述属性引用时, 作为属性值, 指定的字符串首先由类型转换器 () 处理。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 然后, 此类型转换器将处理字符串, 并根据其语法调用构造函数签名之一。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 通过处理特性值的类型转换器进行的这种间接寻址通常是在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中使用的方式 , 而不是声明对象元素, 然后将特定值应用于属性 (如和)。This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[PROPERTYPATH XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 通常不会在直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法中设置该类型的成员。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PathParameters As Collection(Of Object)

summary.span: 获取要在路径引用索引参数时使用的参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters to use when the path refers to indexed parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的属性通常通过构造函数建立。The properties for a are typically established through the constructors. 对于设置 `pathParameters` , 构造函数特别方便, 因为构造函数参数被指定为`params`, 这意味着不需要创建或标注数组以供构造。 For setting , the constructor is particularly convenient because the `pathParameters` constructor argument is designated as `params`, meaning that you do not need to create or dimension an array for construction. 只需指定数组的每个成员作为附加参数。You simply specify each member of the array as an additional parameter. 如果作为目标的最终属性是类型, 则将克隆该值。If the final property that is the target is a type, that value will be cloned. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For details, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 属性链的实际计算由情节提要动画机制来执行。The actual evaluation of the property chain is performed by the storyboard animation mechanisms. 在级别上, 不会执行任何验证来确保路径连接的步骤。At the level, no validation is performed to make sure that the steps of the path connect at all. 例如, 可以构造一个具有作为第一步的属性路径 , 作为第二个步骤。For instance, you can construct a property path that has as the first step, and as the second step. 但如果实际应用为目标, 则此类属性路径会失败, 因为填充 的画笔类型没有属性。But such a property path would fail if actually applied as a target, because the Brush type that fills does not have a property. 无效的属性路径无提示失败。Invalid property paths fail silently. 有关详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). **XAML**当使用在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]描述属性引用时, 作为属性值, 指定的字符串首先由类型转换器 () 处理。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 然后, 此类型转换器将处理字符串, 并根据其语法调用构造函数签名之一。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 通过处理特性值的类型转换器进行的这种间接寻址通常是在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中使用的方式 , 而不是声明对象元素, 然后将特定值应用于属性 (如和)。This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[PROPERTYPATH XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 通常不会在直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法中设置该类型的成员。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.
